showerReviews.reviewText: We stayed in a premium RV site for 4 nights with swings and a fireplace. It is so nice to set out at night under the lighted gazebo.This KOA is clean, well manicured and it has a nice pool that kids will love. The staff are friendly and …
This is a very nice campground. It has all the things you come to expect at a KOA. It has a nice pool, clean bathrooms, and friendly staff. The sites even for a pull through was spacious. …

This is one of the best KOA campgrounds I have been to! It is super clean and in a great location, being so close to things. It also has a fantastic pool for the children. If you are looking for a campground to stay at, I would highly recommend coming here!

The Paw Pen site was awesome! This was a luxurious area and we enjoyed it thoroughly. The staff was nice, bathrooms were great. The only thing that required attention was the kid's pool which required a cleaning. Early in the season but when it's open it needs to be guest-ready. Overall, super spot and I wish we had stayed longer.

showerReviews.reviewText: … As with every review, I need to address the locker rooms. There is a common/open area with lockers, then several individual rooms with showers, toilets, and sinks in each. These are not stalls, they are full bathrooms with lots of space and …

… but I went in to check it out.  Now if they had actually made the doors to the showers and bathrooms solid from top to bottom maybe I wouldn’t have been so creeped out, but they’re not.  A small child or adult could easily stick their …

Living in a different city, but visiting here often and needing a place to workout and shower after, this is a great facility!  We also use it after we ride bikes or run on Monon.  It’s a perfect location!

… The locker rooms are just a larger scale version of the family locker room at the Monon Center. Ideal for families! The way the changing/shower rooms are actually offer significantly more privacy and security than a traditional locker room.

The gym and facility are great. But it’s COED LOCKER ROOMS. Like seriously?? You expect me to let my wife and daughter use the bathroom or change their clothes or shower with men just walking all around them?? …
